TestCase.Direction: Launch -> Network -> PDP Context Cutoff Ratio -> Map

RepeatValidation.SqlTest: SELECT CAST(ROUND((100*RATIO),2) AS NUMERIC(5,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextCR' FROM ( SELECT CAST(INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT + INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT + TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT) AS RATIO FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(sum(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT, ISNULL(sum(NO_OF_NET_INIT_DEACTIVATES),0) AS INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER321_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00' AND RAT=1 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 in (select ALTERNATIVE_FDN from DIM_E_RAN_RNC where RNC_FDN in (select SN from DIM_E_RAN_RNCFUNCTION where rncid={rncId}))) AS suc, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00' AND RAT=1 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 in (select ALTERNATIVE_FDN from DIM_E_RAN_RNC where RNC_FDN in (select SN from DIM_E_RAN_RNCFUNCTION where rncid={rncId})) AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err1, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE DATETIME_ID >= '2014-03-06 09:30' and DATETIME_ID < '2014-03-06 10:00' AND RAT=1 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 in (select ALTERNATIVE_FDN from DIM_E_RAN_RNC where RNC_FDN in (select SN from DIM_E_RAN_RNCFUNCTION where rncid={rncId})) AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err2)AS temp_table

SELECT CAST(ROUND((100*RATIO),2) AS NUMERIC(5,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextCR' FROM ( SELECT CAST(INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT + INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT + TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT) AS RATIO FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(sum(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT,ISNULL(sum(NO_OF_NET_INIT_DEACTIVATES),0) AS INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_VEND_HIER3_EVENTID_SUC_15MIN WHERE {kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND EVENT_ID = 4 ) AS suc, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err1, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err2)AS temp_table

SELECT CAST(ROUND((100*RATIO),2) AS NUMERIC(5,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextCR' FROM ( SELECT CAST(INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT + INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT + TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT) AS RATIO FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(sum(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT,ISNULL(sum(NO_OF_NET_INIT_DEACTIVATES),0) AS INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_IMSI_SUC_RAW WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND TAC={tac} AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND HIER3_ID IN (SELECT HIER3_ID FROM DIM_E_SGEH_HIER321) AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS suc, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC={tac} AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err1, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC={tac} AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err2)AS temp_table

SELECT CAST(ROUND((100*RATIO),2) AS NUMERIC(5,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextCR' FROM ( SELECT CAST(INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT + INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/ (TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT + TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT) AS RATIO FROM( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_suc_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND rat=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC={tac} AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS suc1, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_suc_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND rat=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC={tac} AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS suc2 , ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC={tac} AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err1, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC={tac} AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err2)AS temp_table

SELECT CAST(ROUND((100*RATIO),2) AS NUMERIC(5,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextCR' FROM ( SELECT CAST(INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT + INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT + TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT) AS RATIO FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(sum(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT,ISNULL(sum(NO_OF_NET_INIT_DEACTIVATES),0) AS INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_IMSI_SUC_RAW WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND TAC in (select TAC from DIM_E_SGEH_TAC where MANUFACTURER='{manufacturer}') AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND HIER3_ID IN (SELECT HIER3_ID FROM DIM_E_SGEH_HIER321) AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS suc, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC in (select TAC from DIM_E_SGEH_TAC where MANUFACTURER='{manufacturer}') AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err1, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC in (select TAC from DIM_E_SGEH_TAC where MANUFACTURER='{manufacturer}') AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err2)AS temp_table

SELECT CAST(ROUND((100*RATIO),2) AS NUMERIC(5,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextCR' FROM ( SELECT CAST(INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT + INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/ (TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT + TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT) AS RATIO FROM( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_suc_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND rat=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC IN ( SELECT TAC FROM DIM_E_SGEH_TAC WHERE MANUFACTURER='{manufacturer}') AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS suc1, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_suc_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND rat=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC IN ( SELECT TAC FROM DIM_E_SGEH_TAC WHERE MANUFACTURER='{manufacturer}') AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS suc2 , ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC IN ( SELECT TAC FROM DIM_E_SGEH_TAC WHERE MANUFACTURER='{manufacturer}') AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err1, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC IN ( SELECT TAC FROM DIM_E_SGEH_TAC WHERE MANUFACTURER='{manufacturer}') AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err2)AS temp_table

SELECT CAST(ROUND((100*RATIO),2) AS NUMERIC(5,2)) AS 'sqlPDPContextCR' FROM ( SELECT CAST(INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT + INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT AS DECIMAL(16))/(TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT + TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT) AS RATIO FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(sum(NO_OF_SUCCESSES),0) AS TOTAL_SUC_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT,ISNULL(sum(NO_OF_NET_INIT_DEACTIVATES),0) AS INIT_SUC_DEACTIVATION_COUNT FROM EVENT_E_SGEH_IMSI_SUC_RAW WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND TAC in (select tac from (select tac, manufacturer || '-' || model as ManuModel from dim_e_sgeh_tac where ManuModel='{manufacturerModel}')AS temp2) AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND HIER3_ID IN (SELECT HIER3_ID FROM DIM_E_SGEH_HIER321) AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS suc, ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS TOTAL_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC in (select tac from (select tac, manufacturer || '-' || model as ManuModel from dim_e_sgeh_tac where ManuModel='{manufacturerModel}')AS temp2) AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN ( SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err1, (SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS INIT_ERR_DEACTIVATION_EVENT_COUNT FROM Event_E_sgeh_err_raw WHERE {2.kpiTime} AND RAT=1 AND EVENT_ID = 4 AND hierarchy_3 <> 'Unknown' AND TAC in (select tac from (select tac, manufacturer || '-' || model as ManuModel from dim_e_sgeh_tac where ManuModel='{manufacturerModel}')AS temp2) AND DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER != 1 AND ISNULL(TAC,-1) NOT IN (SELECT TAC FROM dc.GROUP_TYPE_E_TAC WHERE GROUP_NAME = 'EXCLUSIVE_TAC')) AS err2)AS temp_table
